Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Earn 1 TREATS Point for every dollar spent and redeem cashbacks.
Redeem TREATS Points for frequent flyer miles on Singapore Airlines or Malaysia Airlines, or be spoilt for choice with a wide array of rewards from gifts to vouchers.
Gain access to MasterCard smartdatagen2, a powerful online expense management solution.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Complimentary printing of your business logo on your Card.
Company must be in operation for at least 2 years, with an annual sales turnover of at least S$200,000.
